news.title: Measles Is Causing Brain Swelling in Children in South Carolina
news.summary: In the ongoing measles outbreak in South Carolina that has infected more than 800 people, some children have developed a rare but serious complication called encephalitis.

news.title: Notepad++ Users, You May Have Been Hacked by China
news.summary: Suspected Chinese state-backed hackers hijacked the Notepad++ update infrastructure to deliver a backdoored version of the popular free source code editor and note-taking app for Windows.
